p: The cities are defined as prefecture-level administrative units in China (including both build-up city and administrative area). According to the latest administrative planning report, there are currently 334 cities in China. We select 182 cities based on the data availability (see Materials and Methods for data source). The 182 case cities encompass 62% of Chinaâ€™s population as well as 77% of its GDP in 2010.
